title: Slow Dance
subtitle: The Power Of Gentle Joy - Cover : Grace Jones
author: XTrack Team

text.text: Lenny Kravitz + Me One + PM Dawn + Fleetwood Mac + Donald Fagen + Bryan Ferry + Steely Dan + Boz Scags  + Paul Simon + Joni Mitchell + Jimi Hendrix + David Bowie + Chris Isaak + John Lee Hooker x Santana + The Neville Brothers + Joe Cocker +  Grace Jones + Curtis Mayfield + Michael Jackson + Moanday x Gomz + Jungle + Khruangbin x Leon Bridges + Barry White + Daryl Hall & John Oates + Dire Straits + Angus & Julia Stones + Sophie Zelmani + The Rolling Stones + Toto + Dennis Edward x Siedah Garrett + JJ Cale + Sly & the Family Stone + Marvin Gaye + Commodores + Fun Lovin Criminals + The Beatles + Steve Miller Band + Massive Attack x Tricky & +++ enjoy
